translation.Name: Rio Computer - Experiment #1
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: Experiment #31H2 - We've received weird reports from infected regions about powerful zombies, like zombies capable of spitting acid, or zombies that burns eternally. We still don't know how a virus can do that, but this for sure doesn't look like something from this world.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: We've received 10 zombies with some of those powers. The research will start soon. We may get some important data out of this, but until then... lets hope for the best.
